alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 23 at 9:01PM CDT until August 28 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove. * WHEN...From this evening to Sunday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 25.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday was 25.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 26.5 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Tuscolameta Creek Walnut Grove 25.0 25.3 Tue 8 pm CDT 26.4 26.5 26.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 900 AM CDT.
